ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T15:43:25 [Issue ID 4000-175454] urn:comicvine:4000-175454 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 19:12:44. [Issue ID 271626]
ComicInfo.Summary: Luse and Lynn hike their way towards a castle. They find the castle as it appears at sundown. Inside they run into Mishah who Luse immediately shoots in the chest explaining to Lynn that she would turn her into a woman. Luse now knows that Tenth is there and instructs Lynn to wait there while he goes to find him. He finds Tenth in bad shape. Lynn sees Mishah start to get up. Mishah notices she is a woman and figures if Luse would shoot her on sight she must be bad news and starts to fight her. Luse gets a little to close to Tenth which some how turns off the curse Hyena put on him.
ComicInfo.Title: Down by the Sea
